name: Hermit-V6
description: Totally Customisable Bot with its own Baileys ¬© CRASH ‚úò HERMIT

HERMIT_CODE.description: Hermit code (QR scan cheythappo kittiya code). Type here yours Hermit code.

C_CODE.description: Your country code. Use 91 for India!.

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. English => en, Malayalam => ml, Hindi => HI,

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

ALL_IMG.description: Give an image link for your bot!

DIALOGUE.description: Give an image link for your bot!

ALL_CAPTION.description: Give your caption here. Example: Made by Raganork.

VERIFIED.description: Jid given above the verified tick. Use 0 for official WhatsApp

CHATBOT.description: Turn your account into a chatbot!

CALL_BLOCK.description: Set true if you need to block people who calls you üìû.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Heroku API Key. (You can find it in account settings)

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 91xxxx && 91xxxx-1xxx or 91xxxxx,91xxxx...

WORK_TYPE.description: Raganork bot Working Type. If you use ‚Äúpublic‚Äù, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use ‚Äúprivate‚Äù, only you can use your bot.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

V_HEADER.description: Shows on top of verified tick. Type any words here.

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.

OWNER_NAME.description: Owner name used in many commands! Type your name here.

TAG_HEADER.description: Owner name used in many commands! Type your name here.

TAG_REPLY.description: Enter jid of your number so that you get a audio reply when metioned example - 91xxxxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net - for india

ANTI_FAKE.description: Fake number auto remover (Except Indian numbers)! Give true for activating!

BOT_NAME.description: Your bot's name. This is very important!
